Properties.ProtectedString:
--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players") RunService = game:GetService("RunService") ContextActionService = game:GetService("ContextActionService") UserInputService = game:GetService("UserInputService")
Camera = game:GetService("Workspace").CurrentCamera
Animations = {} LocalObjects = {}
ServerControl = Tool:WaitForChild("ServerControl") ClientControl = Tool:WaitForChild("ClientControl")
ToolEquipped = false
function SetAnimation(mode, value) if mode == "PlayAnimation" and value and ToolEquipped and Humanoid then for i, v in pairs(Animations) do if v.Animation == value.Animation then v.AnimationTrack:Stop() table.remove(Animations, i) end end local AnimationTrack = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(value.Animation) table.insert(Animations, {Animation = value.Animation, AnimationTrack = AnimationTrack}) AnimationTrack:Play(value.FadeTime, value.Weight, value.Speed) elseif mode == "StopAnimation" and value then for i, v in pairs(Animations) do if v.Animation == value.Animation then v.AnimationTrack:Stop() table.remove(Animations, i) end end end end
function DisableJump(Boolean) if PreventJump then PreventJump:disconnect() end if Boolean then PreventJump = Humanoid.Changed:connect(function(Property) if Property == "Jump" then Humanoid.Jump = false end end) end end
function CheckIfAlive() return (((Character and Character.Parent and Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent and Humanoid.Health > 0 and Player and Player.Parent) and true) or false) end
function Equipped(Mouse) Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") ToolEquipped = true if not CheckIfAlive() then return end PlayerMouse = Player:GetMouse() Mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() InvokeServer("MouseClick", {Down = true}) end) Mouse.Button1Up:connect(function() InvokeServer("MouseClick", {Down = false}) end) Mouse.KeyDown:connect(function(Key) InvokeServer("KeyPress", {Key = Key, Down = true}) end) Mouse.KeyUp:connect(function(Key) InvokeServer("KeyPress", {Key = Key, Down = false}) end) Mouse.Move:connect(function() InvokeServer("MouseMove", {Position = Mouse.Hit.p, Target = Mouse.Target}) end) if UserInputService.TouchEnabled then ContextActionService:BindActionToInputTypes("Remove", function() Spawn(function() InvokeServer("KeyPress", {Key = "x", Down = true}) end) end, true, "") ContextActionService:SetTitle("Remove", "Remove") end end
function Unequipped() ToolEquipped = false LocalObjects = {} if UserInputService.TouchEnabled then ContextActionService:UnbindAction("Remove") end for i, v in pairs(Animations) do if v and v.AnimationTrack then v.AnimationTrack:Stop() end end for i, v in pairs({PreventJump, ObjectLocalTransparencyModifier}) do if v then v:disconnect() end end Animations = {} end
function InvokeServer(mode, value) pcall(function() local ServerReturn = ServerControl:InvokeServer(mode, value) return ServerReturn end) end
function OnClientInvoke(mode, value) if mode == "PlayAnimation" and value and ToolEquipped and Humanoid then SetAnimation("PlayAnimation", value) elseif mode == "StopAnimation" and value then SetAnimation("StopAnimation", value) elseif mode == "PlaySound" and value then value:Play() elseif mode == "StopSound" and value then value:Stop() elseif mode == "MousePosition" then return {Position = PlayerMouse.Hit.p, Target = PlayerMouse.Target} elseif mode == "DisableJump" then DisableJump(value) elseif mode == "SetCamera" then pcall(function() Camera[value.Property] = value.Value end) elseif mode == "GetCamera" then local PropertyReturned = false local PropertyValue = nil pcall(function() PropertyValue = Camera[value.Property] PropertyReturned = true end) return ((PropertyReturned and PropertyValue) or nil) elseif mode == "SetLocalTransparencyModifier" and value and ToolEquipped then pcall(function() local ObjectFound = false for i, v in pairs(LocalObjects) do if v == value then ObjectFound = true end end if not ObjectFound then table.insert(LocalObjects, value) if ObjectLocalTransparencyModifier then ObjectLocalTransparencyModifier:disconnect() end ObjectLocalTransparencyModifier = RunService.RenderStepped:connect(function() for i, v in pairs(LocalObjects) do if v.Object and v.Object.Parent then local CurrentTransparency = v.Object.LocalTransparencyModifier if ((not v.AutoUpdate and (CurrentTransparency == 1 or CurrentTransparency == 0)) or v.AutoUpdate) then v.Object.LocalTransparencyModifier = v.Transparency end else table.remove(LocalObjects, i) end end end) end end) end end
ClientControl.OnClientInvoke = OnClientInvoke Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Mouse_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png" Reloading_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png"
Tool = script.Parent
Mouse = nil
function UpdateIcon() if Mouse then Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and Mouse_Icon or Reloading_Icon end end
function OnEquipped(ToolMouse) Mouse = ToolMouse UpdateIcon() end
function OnChanged(Property) if Property == "Enabled" then UpdateIcon() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Changed:connect(OnChanged)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
local function Create_PrivImpl(objectType) if type(objectType) ~= 'string' then error("Argument of Create must be a string", 2) end --return the proxy function that gives us the nice Create'string'{data} syntax --The first function call is a function call using Lua's single-string-argument syntax --The second function call is using Lua's single-table-argument syntax --Both can be chained together for the nice effect. return function(dat) --default to nothing, to handle the no argument given case dat = dat or {}
--make the object to mutate local obj = Instance.new(objectType) local parent = nil
--stored constructor function to be called after other initialization local ctor = nil
for k, v in pairs(dat) do --add property if type(k) == 'string' then if k == 'Parent' then -- Parent should always be set last, setting the Parent of a new object -- immediately makes performance worse for all subsequent property updates. parent = v else obj[k] = v end
--add child elseif type(k) == 'number' then if type(v) ~= 'userdata' then error("Bad entry in Create body: Numeric keys must be paired with children, got a: "..type(v), 2) end v.Parent = obj
--event connect elseif type(k) == 'table' and k.__eventname then if type(v) ~= 'function' then error("Bad entry in Create body: Key `[Create.E\'"..k.__eventname.."\']` must have a function value\ got: "..tostring(v), 2) end obj[k.__eventname]:connect(v)
--define constructor function elseif k == t.Create then if type(v) ~= 'function' then error("Bad entry in Create body: Key `[Create]` should be paired with a constructor function, \ got: "..tostring(v), 2) elseif ctor then --ctor already exists, only one allowed error("Bad entry in Create body: Only one constructor function is allowed", 2) end ctor = v
else error("Bad entry ("..tostring(k).." => "..tostring(v)..") in Create body", 2) end end
--apply constructor function if it exists if ctor then ctor(obj) end
if parent then obj.Parent = parent end
--return the completed object return obj end end
--now, create the functor: Create = setmetatable({}, {__call = function(tb, ...) return Create_PrivImpl(...) end})
--and create the "Event.E" syntax stub. Really it's just a stub to construct a table which our Create --function can recognize as special. Create.E = function(eventName) return {__eventname = eventName} end
BaseUrl = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id="
BalloonScript = script:WaitForChild("BalloonScript") Gui = script:WaitForChild("Gui")
MaxSpeed = 15
IdleDuration = 15 --If the owner of the balloon doesn't sit in a seat for this long, the balloon is removed. DeployTick = 0
Connections = {}
Seated = false Flying = false MouseDown = false ToolEquipped = false
ServerControl = (Tool:FindFirstChild("ServerControl") or Instance.new("RemoteFunction")) ServerControl.Name = "ServerControl" ServerControl.Parent = Tool
ClientControl = (Tool:FindFirstChild("ClientControl") or Instance.new("RemoteFunction")) ClientControl.Name = "ClientControl" ClientControl.Parent = Tool
DisplayModel = Tool:FindFirstChild("DisplayModel") if DisplayModel then DisplayModel:Destroy() end
Handle.Transparency = 0 Tool.Enabled = true
function Slerp(t, v1, v2) local om = math.acos(math.min(1, v1:Dot(v2))) return ((om < 0.01 and ((1 - t) * v1 + t * v2)) or ((math.sin((1 - t) * om) / math.sin(om)) * v1 + (math.sin(t * om) / math.sin(om)) * v2)) end
function TransformModel(Objects, Center, NewCFrame, Recurse) local Objects = ((type(Objects) ~= "table" and {Objects}) or Objects) for i, v in pairs(Objects) do if v:IsA("BasePart") then v.CFrame = NewCFrame:toWorldSpace(Center:toObjectSpace(v.CFrame)) end if Recurse then TransformModel(v:GetChildren(), Center, NewCFrame, true) end end end
function GetAllConnectedParts(Object) local Parts = {} local function GetConnectedParts(Object) for i, v in pairs(Object:GetConnectedParts()) do local Ignore = false for ii, vv in pairs(Parts) do if v == vv then Ignore = true end end if not Ignore then table.insert(Parts, v) GetConnectedParts(v) end end end GetConnectedParts(Object) return Parts end
function CreateBalloon() local BaseSize = Vector3.new(7, 0.5, 6.5) local SeatSize = Vector3.new(2, 0.6, 2) local WallSize = Vector2.new(2.5, 0.5) --Y, Z local XWallSize = Vector3.new(BaseSize.X, WallSize.X, WallSize.Y) local ZWallSize = Vector3.new(WallSize.Y, WallSize.X, (BaseSize.Z - (WallSize.Y * 2))) local Model = Create("Model"){ Name = "HotAirBalloon", Create("ObjectValue"){ Name = "Creator", Value = Player, }, Create("NumberValue"){ Name = "IdleDuration", Value = IdleDuration, }, Create("Part"){ Name = "MainPart", Transparency = 1, Material = Enum.Material.Plastic, Shape = Enum.PartType.Block, TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth, BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth, FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom, Size = BaseSize, Locked = true, Create("Weld"){ Name = "SeatWeld", }, Create("Weld"){ Name = "LeftSeatWeld", }, Create("Weld"){ Name = "BalloonWeld", }, Create("Weld"){ Name = "FireWeld1" }, Create("Weld"){ Name = "FireWeld2" }, Create("Weld"){ Name = "LeftWallWeld", }, Create("Weld"){ Name = "RightWallWeld", }, Create("Weld"){ Name = "FrontWallWeld", }, Create("Weld"){ Name = "BackWallWeld", }, Create("BodyGyro"){ Name = "FlyingGyro", maxTorque = Vector3.new(math.huge, math.huge, math.huge), P = 5000, D = 500, cframe = CFrame.new(), }, Create("BodyVelocity"){ Name = "FlyingForce", velocity = Vector3.new(), P = 1000, }, }, Create("Part"){ Name = "LeftWall", Transparency = 1, Material = Enum.Material.Plastic, Shape = Enum.PartType.Block, TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth, BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth, FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom, Size = ZWallSize, Locked = true, }, Create("Part"){ Name = "RightWall", Transparency = 1, Material = Enum.Material.Plastic, Shape = Enum.PartType.Block, TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth, BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth, FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom, Size = ZWallSize, Locked = true, }, Create("Part"){ Name = "FrontWall", Transparency = 1, Material = Enum.Material.Plastic, Shape = Enum.PartType.Block, TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth, BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth, FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom, Size = XWallSize, Locked = true, }, Create("Part"){ Name = "BackWall", Transparency = 1, Material = Enum.Material.Plastic, Shape = Enum.PartType.Block, TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth, BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth, FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom, Size = XWallSize, Locked = true, }, Create("Seat"){ Name = "Seat", BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Really black"), Material = Enum.Material.Plastic, Shape = Enum.PartType.Block, TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth, BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth, FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom, Size = SeatSize, Locked = true, }, Create("Part"){ Name = "FirePart1", Transparency = 1, CanCollide = false, Create("Fire"){ Name = "Fire", Heat = 9, Size = 5, Color = Color3.new((236 / 255), (139 / 255), (70 / 255)), SecondaryColor = Color3.new((139 / 255), (80 / 255), (55 / 255)), Enabled = false, }, Create("Sound"){ Name = "FireSound", SoundId = (BaseUrl .. 30624426), Looped = true, }, }, Create("Part"){ Name = "Balloon", Material = Enum.Material.Plastic, Shape = Enum.PartType.Block, TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth, BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth, FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom, Size = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1), CanCollide = false, Locked = true, Create("SpecialMesh"){ Name = "Mesh", MeshType = "FileMesh", MeshId = (BaseUrl .. 536830948), TextureId = (BaseUrl .. 536831193), Scale = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1), }, }, }
local SeatWeld = Model.MainPart.SeatWeld SeatWeld.Part0 = SeatWeld.Parent SeatWeld.Part1 = Model.Seat SeatWeld.C0 = CFrame.new(0, SeatSize.Y, 0)
local BalloonWeld = Model.MainPart.BalloonWeld BalloonWeld.Part0 = BalloonWeld.Parent BalloonWeld.Part1 = Model.Balloon BalloonWeld.C0 = CFrame.new(0, 12, 0)
local LeftWeld = Model.MainPart.LeftWallWeld LeftWeld.Part0 = LeftWeld.Parent LeftWeld.Part1 = Model.LeftWall LeftWeld.C0 = CFrame.new(((Model.LeftWall.Size.X / 2) + (Model.MainPart.Size.X / 2) - Model.FrontWall.Size.X), ((Model.LeftWall.Size.Y / 2) + (Model.MainPart.Size.Y / 2)), 0)
local RightWeld = Model.MainPart.RightWallWeld RightWeld.Part0 = RightWeld.Parent RightWeld.Part1 = Model.RightWall RightWeld.C0 = CFrame.new(-((Model.RightWall.Size.X / 2) + (Model.MainPart.Size.X / 2) - Model.FrontWall.Size.X), ((Model.RightWall.Size.Y / 2) + (Model.MainPart.Size.Y / 2)), 0)
local FrontWeld = Model.MainPart.FrontWallWeld FrontWeld.Part0 = FrontWeld.Parent FrontWeld.Part1 = Model.FrontWall FrontWeld.C0 = CFrame.new(0, ((Model.FrontWall.Size.Y / 2) + (Model.MainPart.Size.Y / 2)), ((Model.FrontWall.Size.Z / 2) + (Model.MainPart.Size.Z / 2) - Model.FrontWall.Size.Z))
local BackWeld = Model.MainPart.BackWallWeld BackWeld.Part0 = BackWeld.Parent BackWeld.Part1 = Model.BackWall BackWeld.C0 = CFrame.new(0, ((Model.BackWall.Size.Y / 2) + (Model.MainPart.Size.Y / 2)), -((Model.BackWall.Size.Z / 2) + (Model.MainPart.Size.Z / 2) - Model.BackWall.Size.Z))
local FireWeld1 = Model.MainPart.FireWeld1 FireWeld1.Part0 = FireWeld1.Parent FireWeld1.Part1 = Model.FirePart1 FireWeld1.C0 = CFrame.new(0, 9.5, -0.25)
local BalloonScriptClone = BalloonScript:Clone() BalloonScriptClone.Disabled = false BalloonScriptClone.Parent = Model
return { Balloon = Model, Creator = Model.Creator, MainPart = Model.MainPart, BodyGyro = Model.MainPart.FlyingGyro, BodyVelocity = Model.MainPart.FlyingForce, FirePart = Model.FirePart1, Fire = Model.FirePart1.Fire, FireSound = Model.FirePart1.FireSound, }
end
function BeginFlight()
if not CurrentBalloon or not CurrentBalloon.Balloon or not CurrentBalloon.Balloon.Parent then return end
local MainPart = CurrentBalloon.Balloon:FindFirstChild("MainPart") if not MainPart then return end
Flying = true
pcall(function() GuiClone.Frame.Message.Text = "Click and Hold to direct the Balloon in the" .. "\n" .. "direction you are looking. Holding with both" .. "\n".. "mouse buttons gives easy free flight." end)
ControlBalloon()
end
function EndFlight()
if CurrentBalloon and CurrentBalloon.Balloon.Parent then for i, v in pairs({CurrentBalloon.Fire}) do if v and v.Parent then v.Enabled = false end end end
Flying = false
pcall(function() GuiClone.Frame.Message.Text = "Click to place a Balloon." .. "\n".. "Get into a Balloon to fly it." end)
end
function ControlBalloon()
if not CurrentBalloon or not CurrentBalloon.Balloon.Parent or not CurrentBalloon.MainPart.Parent or not CurrentBalloon.BodyGyro.Parent or not CurrentBalloon.BodyVelocity.Parent then return end
local MainPart = CurrentBalloon.MainPart local FlyingForce = CurrentBalloon.BodyVelocity local FlyingGyro = CurrentBalloon.BodyGyro local FirePart1 = CurrentBalloon.FirePart1 local Fire = CurrentBalloon.Fire
local SoundPlaying = false
local BalloonMass = 0 for i, v in pairs(GetAllConnectedParts(MainPart)) do BalloonMass = (BalloonMass + v:GetMass()) end BalloonMass = (BalloonMass * 2 * 196.20) FlyingForce.maxForce = Vector3.new(BalloonMass, BalloonMass, BalloonMass)
local CurrentVelocity = math.min(MaxSpeed, FlyingForce.velocity.magnitude)
local LastTime = tick() local DesiredFlightCFrame = MainPart.CFrame
while ToolEquipped and Flying do local Now = tick() local Time = (Now - LastTime) LastTime = Now
if Flying then
local CoordinateFrame = InvokeClient("GetCamera", {Property = "CoordinateFrame"}) local MoveDirection = (CoordinateFrame * CFrame.Angles(0.6, 0, 0)) if MouseDown then local Theta = math.acos(DesiredFlightCFrame.lookVector:Dot(MoveDirection.lookVector)) local Frac = math.min(0.7, (0.7 * Time / Theta)) local Unit = Slerp(Frac, DesiredFlightCFrame.lookVector, MoveDirection.lookVector) DesiredFlightCFrame = CFrame.new(Vector3.new(0, 0, 0), Unit)
if CurrentVelocity < MaxSpeed then CurrentVelocity = math.min((CurrentVelocity + 8 * Time), MaxSpeed) end else if CurrentVelocity > 2 then CurrentVelocity = math.max(0, (CurrentVelocity - 3 * Time)) end end
local Direction = DesiredFlightCFrame.lookVector local DirectionXZ = Vector3.new(Direction.X, 0, Direction.Z).unit
FlyingGyro.cframe = CFrame.new(Vector3.new(), DirectionXZ) * CFrame.Angles(0, 0, 0) --CFrame.Angles(0, 0, (MainPart.RotVelocity.y / 3 * (1 - math.abs(Direction.Y) ^ 2)))
if FirePart1 and FirePart1.Parent then local FireSound = FirePart1:FindFirstChild("FireSound") if FireSound then if Direction.y > 0 then if not SoundPlaying then SoundPlaying = true FireSound:Play() end else SoundPlaying = false FireSound:Stop() end end end for i, v in pairs({Fire}) do if v and v.Parent then v.Enabled = MouseDown --(Direction.y > 0 and CurrentVelocity > 2) end end local SlowDownFactor = math.abs(MainPart.RotVelocity.Y / 3) FlyingForce.velocity = (Direction.unit * (CurrentVelocity - SlowDownFactor) * (1 - Direction.Y ^ 2)) end wait() end end
function SetUpConnections() for i, v in pairs(Connections) do if v then v:disconnect() end end Connections = {} if CurrentBalloon and CurrentBalloon.Balloon then local Balloon = CurrentBalloon.Balloon local BalloonRemoved = Balloon.Changed:connect(function(Property) if Property == "Parent" and not Balloon.Parent then Handle.Transparency = 0 end end) for i, v in pairs(Balloon:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("Seat") then local SeatWeldAdded = v.ChildAdded:connect(function(Child) if Child:IsA("JointInstance") and Child.Name == "SeatWeld" and not Flying then if ((Child.Part0 and Child.Part0.Parent == Character) or (Child.Part1 and Child.Part1.Parent == Character)) then Seated = true BeginFlight() end end end) local SeatWeldRemoved = v.ChildRemoved:connect(function(Child) if Child:IsA("JointInstance") and Child.Name == "SeatWeld" and Flying then if ((Child.Part0 and Child.Part0.Parent == Character) or (Child.Part1 and Child.Part1.Parent == Character)) then Seated = false EndFlight() end end end) for i, v in pairs({BalloonRemoved, SeatWeldAdded, SeatWeldRemoved}) do if v then table.insert(Connections, v) end end end end end end
function CheckIfAlive() return (((Character and Character.Parent and Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent and Humanoid.Health > 0 and Torso and Torso.Parent and Player and Player.Parent) and true) or false) end
function Equipped(Mouse) Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") Torso = Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") if not CheckIfAlive() then return end Spawn(function() local PlayerGui = Player:FindFirstChild("PlayerGui") if PlayerGui then GuiClone = Gui:Clone() GuiClone.Frame.Message.Text = "Click to create a Balloon." .. "\n" .. "Get into a Balloon to fly it." GuiClone.Parent = PlayerGui end end) Spawn(function() if CurrentBalloon and CurrentBalloon.Balloon.Parent then Handle.Transparency = 1 if Seated then BeginFlight() end end end) ToolEquipped = true end
function Unequipped() MouseDown = false EndFlight() if GuiClone and GuiClone.Parent then GuiClone:Destroy() end Handle.Transparency = 0 ToolEquipped = false end
function OnServerInvoke(player, mode, value) if player == Player and ToolEquipped and value and CheckIfAlive() then if mode == "MouseClick" then local Down = value.Down if Down then MouseDown = true if (tick() - DeployTick) > IdleDuration and (not CurrentBalloon or not CurrentBalloon.Balloon.Parent) then DeployTick = tick() Seated = false Flying = false Handle.Transparency = 1 local MousePosition = InvokeClient("MousePosition") local Direction = CFrame.new(Torso.Position, MousePosition.Position) CurrentBalloon = CreateBalloon() local Balloon = CurrentBalloon.Balloon local MainPart = CurrentBalloon.MainPart TransformModel(Balloon, Balloon:GetModelCFrame(), (((Torso.CFrame + Vector3.new(0, 3, 0)) + Direction.lookVector * 10) * CFrame.Angles(0, 0, 0)), true) MainPart.CFrame = CFrame.new(Vector3.new(MainPart.Position.X, Torso.Position.Y, MainPart.Position.Z), Torso.Position) CurrentBalloon.BodyGyro.cframe = MainPart.CFrame Balloon.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace") SetUpConnections(CurrentBalloon) end else MouseDown = false end elseif mode == "KeyPress" then local Key = value.Key local ByteKey = string.byte(Key) local Down = value.Down if Key == "x" and Down then if CurrentBalloon and CurrentBalloon.Balloon.Parent then CurrentBalloon.Balloon:Destroy() end end end end end
function InvokeClient(Mode, Value) local ClientReturn = nil pcall(function() ClientReturn = ClientControl:InvokeClient(Player, Mode, Value) end) return ClientReturn end
Tool.Changed:connect(function(Property) if Property == "Parent" and not Tool.Parent:IsA("Backpack") and not Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Tool.Parent) then if CurrentBalloon and CurrentBalloon.Balloon.Parent then CurrentBalloon.Balloon:Destroy() end end end)
ServerControl.OnServerInvoke = OnServerInvoke Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

Properties.string: Click to place a Balloon. Get into a Balloon to fly it.

Properties.ProtectedString:
--Made by Luckymaxer
Model = script.Parent Balloon = Model:FindFirstChild("Balloon") MainPart = Model:FindFirstChild("MainPart")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
Seated = Instance.new("BoolValue") Seated.Value = false
Seats = {}
function DestroyModel() Debris:AddItem(Model, 0.5) end
Creator = Model:FindFirstChild("Creator") IdleDuration = Model:FindFirstChild("IdleDuration")
if not Balloon or not MainPart or not Creator or not Creator.Value or not Creator.Value:IsA("Player") or not Creator.Value.Parent or not IdleDuration then DestroyModel() return end
BalloonWeld = MainPart:FindFirstChild("BalloonWeld") if not BalloonWeld then DestroyModel() return end
Player = Creator.Value Character = Player.Character
IdleDuration = IdleDuration.Value
function GetAllConnectedParts(Object) local Parts = {} local function GetConnectedParts(Object) for i, v in pairs(Object:GetConnectedParts()) do local Ignore = false for ii, vv in pairs(Parts) do if v == vv then Ignore = true end end if not Ignore then table.insert(Parts, v) GetConnectedParts(v) end end end GetConnectedParts(Object) return Parts end
function IdleRemove() local CanRemove = true local RemoveCheck = Seated.Changed:connect(function() if Seated.Value then CanRemove = false end end) wait(IdleDuration) if RemoveCheck then RemoveCheck:disconnect() end if CanRemove then DestroyModel() end end
Player.Changed:connect(function(Property) if Property == "Parent" and not Player.Parent then DestroyModel() elseif Property == "Character" and not Player.Character or not Player.Character.Parent then DestroyModel() end end)
for i, v in pairs(Model:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("Seat") then table.insert(Seats, v) v.ChildAdded:connect(function(Child) if Child:IsA("JointInstance") and Child.Name == "SeatWeld" then if ((Child.Part0 and Child.Part0.Parent == Character) or (Child.Part1 and Child.Part1.Parent == Character)) then Seated.Value = true end end end) v.ChildRemoved:connect(function(Child) if Child:IsA("JointInstance") and Child.Name == "SeatWeld" then if ((Child.Part0 and Child.Part0.Parent == Character) or (Child.Part1 and Child.Part1.Parent == Character)) then Seated.Value = false end end end) end end
Spawn(function() Seated.Changed:connect(function() if not Seated.Value then IdleRemove() end end)
IdleRemove() end)
Spawn(function() --Broken monitor; Will determine whether or not the balloon is intact or in pieces. while true do if not MainPart.Parent or not Balloon.Parent or (not BalloonWeld.Parent or not BalloonWeld.Part0 or not BalloonWeld.Part0.Parent or not BalloonWeld.Part1 or not BalloonWeld.Part1.Parent) then --The base or balloon of the model is missing, so the balloon is removed. DestroyModel() break end local ConnectedParts = GetAllConnectedParts(MainPart) for i, v in pairs(Seats) do local SeatWelded = false for ii, vv in pairs(ConnectedParts) do if v == vv then SeatWelded = true end end if not SeatWelded then --If neither seat is attached to the balloon, it is unusable, therefore it is removed. table.remove(Seats, i) end if #Seats == 0 then DestroyModel() break end end wait(1) end end)
